title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When working with binary projects, I encountered an issue related to the scoped type hierarchy. I don't fully understand it.
OB: When I try to view the class hierarchies of the internal jars by selecting 'org.apache.ant' in the scoped type hierarchy (org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, can you explain the meaning of this message?
EB: When I try to view the class hierarchies of the internal jars by selecting 'org.apache.ant' in the scoped type hierarchy, I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, can you explain the meaning of this message?
